CustomField.formula: IF (AccountId__c != null, AccountId__r.TimeZoneAbbrev__c , IF (LeadId__c != null, LeadId__r.TimeZoneAbbrev__c , IF ( ReferralAccount__c != null, ReferralAccount__r.TimeZoneAbbrev__c , IF (OpportunityId__c != null, OpportunityId__r.Account.TimeZoneAbbrev__c, null))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Time Zone this record is part of
CustomField.label: Time Zone Abbrev
